entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JSON deserialization fails in iOS release build if class implements an interface #75802
  • mono AOT compiler cannot resolve and inline static virtual calls in gshared methods #75801
  • On Linux, the `KeyChar` of the `ConsoleKeyInfo` returned from `Ctrl+c` becomes `\0` with .NET 7-RC.1 #75795
  • NETSDK1191 error when building crossgen2.csproj with RC2 SDK #75794
  • GCStress crash stable repro #75792
    7.0.0
  • Vector128 and Vector256 General purpose DotProduct tests fail #75791

Closed

  • Vector.IsHardwareAccelerated result differs when called directly and called via reflection #38162
    8.0.0
  • bug in IRootFunctions double.Hypot #75651
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] error when compiling tests #75780
  • SPMI collection of coreclr R2R and similar tests is failing #75539
    8.0.0
  • NTLM fails for HTTP only connection #75579
  • JIT: libraries jitstress failures Assertion failed 'addr->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF)' #75644
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\StrAccess\\straccess1_cs_ro\\straccess1_cs_ro.cmd #75659
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_70790/Runtime_70790/Runtime_70790.sh #75657
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Make conservative stack reporting configurable. #75803
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] hide interop delegates from intellisense #75800
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [wasm] fix missing managed stack trace on managed exceptions marshaled to JS #75799
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Only R2R blittable IL stubs that aren't inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, needs-author-action, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • Ensure that all paths of double.Hypot use the absolute value where required #75776
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove unused Utils file #75777
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Add workaround for msbuild issue in tests #75743
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Fix building src/tests #75781
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use *_NOCTOR jit helpers version once class is initialized #75785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't set JitPath for coreclr test SPMI collections #75765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] fix missing managed stack trace on managed exceptions marshaled to JS #75678
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Don't propagate const TYP_REF as TYP_I_IMPL #75661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip frozen segments for commit accounting #75738
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Memory model document. #75790
    memory model
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Audit MemoryExtensions.IndexOf variants #75754
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Update gtHasLocalsWithAddrOp to use GenTreeVisitor #75672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Ensure Max/Min for floating-point on x86/x64 are not handled as commutative #75772
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix behavior of JMC #75783
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Do not request type layout for RuntimeDetermined types #75789
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Jupyter is not available in dotnet 6.0, broken with dotnet 3.1 install #27976

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1996735 #27667
  • Make mapping infrastructure unit testable, Ignore effectively sealed members and types and add tests #27962
    Area-ApiCompat

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Use recursive patterns" suggests redundant "this is { ... }" pattern #64111
  • CoreCompile is missing Analyzer references in it's stated inputs #64103

Closed

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces 4.3.0 bug #64079

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove out of proc TodoList computation #64110
    Area-IDE
  • Improve SymbolDisplay to handle operator symbols that are not valid operators for the target language. #64109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Use pattern matching for multi-kind checks #64108
    Area-IDE
  • Use patterns to simplify a few checks. #64106
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64105
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move deserialization code next to serialization code. #64104
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64101
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64102
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64113
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64112
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ReturnOnly scope #64090
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • `scoped` should set ref escape scope to current block #64093
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - Turn on experiment + turn off old snippets while new snippet experience is on #63991
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor @key not working when inside RenderFragment or Repeater like component #44039
  • Blank Blazor WASM app fails to publish with PublishTrimmed set to false on .NET 7 RC1 #44038

Closed

  • [Blazor] localStorage.getItem errors with complex objects #43974
  • OutOfProcess and IIS Threads #42713
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Vectorized HttpCharacters #44041
    community-contribution
  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/3.1] Stop building on Ubuntu 18.04 #43666
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1996737 #43956
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Enable traverseheap command under lldb/dotnet-dump on all platforms #3388

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to bind `Glyph` property in `FontImageSource` of `ToolbarItem` #10186
  • Odd behaviour dragging window OR anything (sortable lists, etc) #10185
  • Catalyst Gallery no longer resizes to fit the window #10183
    7.0
  • Can't disable swipe on Shell Top Tabs #10182
  • Another problem Occurs in Release Mode, Dynamic Color or Programmatically C# not Changed... [RELEASE MODE ONLY] #10181
  • Can't add Map Pins #10180
  • There is no link for mac installations #10179

Closed

  • [BUG ] The namespace is not being adhered to for the new content pages being created. #9488
  • Image wrong rotation with a ContentView and BindableProperty #9969
    Backlog
  • Adding a conditional compilation symbol generate the symbol 'TRACETRACE' #9673
  • DeviceDisplay.Current.KeepScreenOn = true isn't working #8145
  • UI Automation hit testing on CollectionView items hangs Maui app #8801
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [documentation] Fix typo #10187
    community ✨
  • Set BackgroundColor for Label and a few others on templates #10184
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10178
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Fix insights from crashing when using Frame and CollectionView #10168

Updated

  • [Android] Fix crash navigating on Shell using a custom TitleView #10160
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add resource removal to ChangeTracking #29116
  • Is there anyway to debug Add-Migrations? #29090

Updated

  • When EF7 RC is referenced from a Function App, the app throws a runtime error on startup #29123
  • Set operations: infer type mappings from the other side #29081
    Backlog
  • Batch split queries #10878
    Backlog
  • SplitQuery per-table definition #29089
    Backlog
  • Scale is not considered when converting decimal to string #26726
    Backlog
  • Navigation on value objects #28963
    Backlog
  • EF wrongly adds items #29060
    Backlog
  • Why do we need to bootstrap a functional startup project to generate an idempotent migration script? #29063
  • Creating Migration failed by the issue with Geometry type in entity #29067
  • DetectChanges works incorrect when update nested owned entity #29085
    7.0.0
  • Specify facets and store types in Northwind model #29087
    MQ
  • Typo on the page #29125
    MQ

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 from 2.1.2-pre20220913165057 to 2.1.2-pre20220916165053 #29132
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.1.2-pre20220913165057 to 2.1.2-pre20220916165053 #29131
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.2-pre20220913165057 to 2.1.2-pre20220916165053 #29130
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.1.2-pre20220913165057 to 2.1.2-pre20220916165053 #29129
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.1.2-pre20220913165057 to 2.1.2-pre20220916165053 #29128
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Reverse engineering of Dynamics CRM TDS endpoint and Synapse Serverless SQL Pool #29122
  • Templates: Specify a groupIdentity for ef-templates #29118
    Servicing-consider
